title: Looking to trade t202 cobb and T202 speaker
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade t202 cobb and T202 speaker
posts.post_content:
Was hoping to do a possible trade for the t202's I need.

I have the following:
O'Leary/Fast Work at third/Cobb

[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=22768&d=]Attachment 22768[/URL]
Card has obvious issues but is in one piece and could be worse(?).
Looking to trade for a similar condition of the following:
O'leary/A Desperate slide for third/Cobb
moriarity/Good play at third/Cobb
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=22769&d=1280887588[/IMG]

Also have this card to trade: Speaker/Engle in a close play/speaker

Looking to get:
Speaker/Speaker scores/Engle in similar shape or
Matty/Just before the battle/fletcher
matty/Devlin gets his man/fletcher
matty/devlin gets his man/devlin (giants
